snippet.title: Carnival Cruise Lines Amber Cove for FREE | First Carnival Cruise to Amber Cove in 2021 | Pool Tour
snippet.description:
Book your Carnival Cruise through JJ Cruise!: https://lovelandandsea.com/jjcruise
--------------------------------------------------- 
JJ Cruise visits Carnival’s Amber Cove in Puerto, Plata, Dominican Republic onboard Carnival Horizon 2021 and does a completely FREE day at Amber Cove! We are on the first Carnival cruise out of Florida on Carnival Horizon cruising in 2021 for Carnival Cruise Line. Here is our full experience and review of Amber Cove on Carnival Horizon in 2021! The cruise industry is rapidly changing and we are excited to bring you the latest cruise news today to the cruise community. 

In the cruise news latest we are onboard Carnival Horizon Cruise Ship 2021. With the latest cruise news comes a lot of the usual cruise ports while cruising on cruise ships in 2021. Carnival Horizon went to Carnival’s private destination of Amber Cove which has a lot to do but for an extra fee. So we decided to do a full free day of fun at Amber Cove! Carnival Cruise Port Amber Cove Reviews and full experience are what we have to provide you in today's video as we try Amber Cove for free including Photo ops, window shopping, nature hikes, kids wet area and fun zone, swimming pools and water slides, and relaxing loungers. Amber Cove has a lot to do and is a main port for Carnival Cruise ships including Carnival Horizon, Carnival Panorama, Carnival Sunshine, Carnival Vista and Carnival Mardi Gras Cruise Ships. What excursions do you do at Amber Cove? This is the latest cruise news allowing cruising to restart in the US! We are talking about what this cruise ship news means for the major North American cruise lines, Royal Caribbean International, Norwegian Cruise Line, Carnival Cruise Line, MSC Cruises, and Disney Cruise Line and how it ties into the US Cruise Restart this summer. 

We had the incredible opportunity to climb aboard Royal Caribbean Cruise Line's Adventure of the Seas FIRST sailing out of Nassau, Bahamas on June 12th, 2021. We also sailed the FIRST sailing out of the US on Celebrity Edge on June 26th, 2021. Celebrity Cruise Lines was the first major North American cruise line to sail from a North American port since March 2020. We also sailed the first Carnival cruise out of Florida on July 4th Carnival Horizon sailing bringing you all of the latest cruise news aboard the Carnival Horizon cruise ship! We are excited to announce we will be on the Carnival Mardi Gras Cruise Ship Inaugural Sailing on July 31st, 2021! We are thrilled to be on these ships to bring you the most up-to-date information about the future of the cruise industry in this "New Normal" we find ourselves in. 

Don't miss important information about upcoming Royal Caribbean Cruises, Celebrity Cruises, Norwegian Cruises, Disney Cruises and Carnival Cruise Line cruises, and cruise news latest about the future of cruising. Comment and tell us what you think! Have you been to Amber Cove on a Carnival Cruise? What are your thoughts on Amber Cove Cruise Port aboard a Carnival Cruise? Do you plan to get off on your next Carnival cruise ship in 2021 at Amber Cove? 

Carnival Horizon 2021 - the Good and Bad: https://youtu.be/ptCAMkwX0m4 
Every FUN Activity on Carnival Horizon: https://youtu.be/nxa6_MLTCqg 
Best Food on Carnival Ships: https://youtu.be/jBzLJ_cmqe0 
Carnival Horizon Live Sail Away with Mardi Gras Escort: https://youtu.be/RdsgD39zOCg 
Celebrity Edge First Cruise out of US Wasn’t What We Expected: https://youtu.be/Fy8zjZGlvwU 
Shocking Changes onboard Adventure of the Seas: https://youtu.be/jgrC4gU2G-I 
People Denied Boarding to Bahamas:https://youtu.be/TW9o9rVgGF0 
How We Earned a Free Cruise!: https://youtu.be/CWenKFxOx8s  


Intro Music: www.bensound.com 
--------------------------------------------------- 
Connect with Us! 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/JJCruiseFB/ 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cruisewithjj 
Ship Mate: jtay (Jordan); cruisewithjj (Jared) 
Email: cruisewithjj@gmail.com 
---------------------------------------------------
Support us on Patreon!
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/jjcruise 
--------------------------------------------------- 
Like our video and subscribe!! 
--------------------------------------------------- 
#CarnivalHorizon #CruiseNews #CarnivalCruise
